general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect. The high temperature increases the water requirement of maize crop. Spread polythene in irrigation channels to save water wastage. High temperature in day hours may lead to wilting in tomato and brinjal. Mulch coconut leaves around a coconut tree to reduce water loss. Cover with paper caps on the newly planted vegetable seedlings during the daytime. In shallow ponds, harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises.

advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are critical. Avoid water deficit during these stages.
Cover the rows with dry leaves. Top-dress with 4% potassium. Irrigate frequently during hot months.
High temperature increases water requirement. Irrigate the crop. Avoid stagnant water in the field.
Apply 1g Streptocyclin in the root zone to prevent wilting.
Install pheromone traps. Spray neem-based pesticide during initial infestation.
Mulch coconut leaves around the tree to reduce water loss.
Cover newly planted seedlings with paper caps during the daytime.
Harvest fingerlings from shallow ponds if water temperature rises.
Check and control tobacco caterpillar migration.
Check and control tobacco caterpillar migration.
Cut tops after harvesting. Dry bulbs in well-ventilated room.
Control mango hoppers by spraying recommended insecticides.
